[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=”.vc_custom_1502356075410{padding-bottom: 0px !important;background-image: url(http://wpdemo.oceanthemes.net/blessing/wp-content/uploads/sites/7/2017/07/pic-6-1.jpg?id=172) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” el_class=”bg-fixed”][vc_column width=”2/3″ animate=”fadeinleft” delay=”.5″][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_custom_heading text=”Welcome To Church” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1649698195009{margin-bottom: 10px !important;}”]

Hello and welcome to our church website, it’s always a real joy for us to meet and have new members in our church family.

Here you will find useful information about our belief.

Our mission is leading people in a growing relationship with Jesus Christ. Please join our church and start a new life.

[/vc_column_text][vc_custom_heading text=”Rev. Tony Kiamah
Lead Pastor” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_single_image image=”12054″ img_size=”full” css=”.vc_custom_1620075635491{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″ animate=”fadeinup”][vc_column_text]

[/vc_column_text] READ MORE [/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″ animate=”fadeinright” delay=”.75″ css=”.vc_custom_1501841252640{margin-bottom: 30px !important;}”][vc_single_image image=”11536″ img_size=”full” css=”.vc_custom_1619895156044{margin-bottom: 20px !important;}”][vc_custom_heading text=”Church Mission” font_container=”tag:h3|text_align:left” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1647336846038{margin-bottom: 20px !important;}”]REACH people for Christ

REFRESH belivers by the word of God

REFINE belivers for good works

RELEASE believers to transform the world[/vc_column_text] READ MORE [/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″ animate=”fadeinright” delay=”1″ css=”.vc_custom_1501841258653{margin-bottom: 30px !important;}”][vc_single_image image=”11215″ img_size=”full” css=”.vc_custom_1619895187267{margin-bottom: 20px !important;}”][vc_custom_heading text=”Leadership Structure” font_container=”tag:h3|text_align:left” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1649928073503{margin-bottom: 20px !important;}”]The River of God Church,  (KAG Parklands) is led by Lead Pastor, Rev Tony Kiamah, Associate Pastor Rev. Carole Kiamah. It has a six-member deacon board who together with the Lead Pastor oversee the church’s management and are its decision-making organ.[/vc_column_text] READ MORE [/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row fullwidth=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1501822695769{padding-top: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}” el_class=”bg-color”][vc_column]
